Specimen Type: Fresh stool, tissue biopsy, respiratory (e.g., sputum, BAL), and urine samples
Purpose: To detect Microsporidia species in clinical specimens using PCR for accurate diagnosis.
Container: Sterile, properly labeled container appropriate for the specimen type
Equipment: Biological safety cabinet, centrifuge, PCR thermal cycler, micropipettes with sterile tips, vortex mixer, gel electrophoresis apparatus, UV transilluminator
